text_content.paragraph: The Visual Asset Locator (VAL) is a web mapping application used by the Chesapeake Contact Center. This application provides a mapping interface to quickly navigate to a geographic location. Click on each of the numbers on the Map tab screenshot to identify each area.
On the following pages, we will discuss each of these areas in more detail.

page.prompt: CLICK EACH OF THE NUMBERS ON THE GRAPHIC TO LEARN MORE. THEN CLICK THE NEXT ARROW TO CONTINUE.

cc_text.paragraph: The Visual Asset Locator (VAL) is a web mapping application used by the Chesapeake Contact Center. This application provides a mapping interface to quickly navigate to a geographic location. Click on each of the numbers on the Map tab screenshot below to identify each area.
